title: In my experience, traffic rotaries always move traffic in a counter-clockwise direction, giving way to vehicles already in the rotary.  So, what\'s with the  two-lane, multi-directional rotary at Mayfaire, near the Hilton Gardens  It seems like a disaster waiting to happen.  Are there any plans to change this?
text:
There are no current plans to change the traffic patterns already in
place at Mayfaire.
